title: Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask, LC-dolida Sleeping Headphones for Side Sleepers Sleep Mask with Bluetooth Headphones Ultra-Thin Stereo Speakers Perfect for Sleeping
descriptions:
Product Name: LC-dolida Sleep Headphones, 3D Sleep Mask Bluetooth Wireless Music Eye Mask for Side Sleepers

Type: 3 in 1 Sleep Headphones, Bluetooth Sleep Mask, and Sleep Eye Mask

Bluetooth Version: 5.2 with fast paring speed and low power consumption

Wireless Range: 45 feet

Compatible Devices: Most Bluetooth-enabled devices

Sound Quality: HD Stereo Sound with high-fidelity, immersive environment

Battery Life: 8-10 hours playtime, 1-2 hours charging time

Mask Design: 3D contoured eye mask with zero eye pressure, adjustable strap, and suitability for side sleepers. Made with memory foam and soft, skin-friendly fabric that is breathable and hypoallergenic. Perfect light blockage for uninterrupted sleep.

Ideal for: Insomnia, air travel, meditation, yoga, migraine headaches, dry-eye sufferers

Gift Ideas: Cool tech gadget, unique gift for occasions such as Christmas, Valentine's Day, Halloween, Easter, Birthday, Mother's Day, Father’s Day, Teacher’s Day. Suitable for men, women, teen, girl, boy, dad, mom.
